meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kathy Cacace Avram Polinsky Jerry Slowik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6740.

td.p: Kathy Cacace, an online editor from Brooklyn, New York
Avram Polinsky, a customer service analyst from Columbia, Maryland
Jerry Slowik, a writer from Arlington Heights, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,199)

tr.td: OLYMPIC CITY ATTRACTIONS
COLORFUL MOVIES
FUN WITH ACRONYMS
WHAT'S MY AIRLINE?
WORLD HISTORY
YOUR NAME IS PERFECT
